Articles.Content:
If you are a fan of the Marathon series by Bungie, or you like mods of games, you might like this.  Instead of short edited videos of game play, this time the videos are longer and are streamed.

Marathon Rubicon X is not part of Bungie's Marathon Trilogy, but is a 3rd party scenario, or as it would be called today, a mod.  Instead of posting each video here, I'll just post one link to the playlist.  I think it will be updated about once or twice per week.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLIof4Cp3-cakQzAL4xHJIpCDIEH83IfQs
